name: open-chat
description: Modern AI Chat Application with Image Generation - React + Vite frontend and Node.js + Express backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run preview" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.install:deps: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install

author: Luis Felipe Werneck
